DrugName: Beta blockers like propranolol or metoprolol for Postural Tachycardia Syndrome (PTSD)
Migraine prevention with propranolol, topiramate, or onabotulinumtoxinA
Nausea/Vomiting treatment with ondansetron, metoclopramide, or promethazine for migraine-induced nausea and vomiting
Antidepressants like selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) such as fluoxetine or sertraline for Post-Partum depression
Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors (SSRI), like sertraline or paroxetine, to treat anxiety and panic disorder
A benzodiazepine like alprazolam may be considered as a short-term option for anxiety management in conjunction with ongoing therapy
If necessary, other medications such as venlafaxine or clonidine can also be considered based on the severity of symptoms and under strict medical supervision
